metaTitle: HORIZON San Miguel de Salinas | Bungalows from €209,900
metaDescription: Discover HORIZON by SANTAMAR in San Miguel de Salinas. Modern 2-3 bed bungalows from €209,900. Delivery 2026. Invest in Costa Blanca's most sought location.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to HORIZON, an exceptional residential development by SANTAMAR located in the heart of San Miguel de Salinas, Alicante. This prestigious project offers 2-3 bedroom bungalows starting from €209,900, designed for discerning buyers seeking modern living in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable locations. Each property features contemporary architecture, generous built areas ranging from 68-85m², and private plot sizes of 33-54m². HORIZON represents the perfect blend of affordability, quality, and lifestyle, with completion scheduled for September 1st, 2026. Whether you're seeking a vacation retreat, permanent residence, or investment opportunity, HORIZON delivers exceptional value in a thriving international community where English is widely spoken and amenities are world-class.

locationSection.intro: San Miguel de Salinas is a thriving municipality nestled between Torrevieja and Orihuela on the Costa Blanca, renowned for its authentic Spanish character combined with modern convenience. This established destination has become increasingly popular with international buyers seeking genuine value without compromising on lifestyle. The town offers a perfect balance of tranquility and accessibility, with an established expatriate community that has created an English-friendly environment. San Miguel de Salinas benefits from proximity to stunning Blue Flag beaches, championship golf courses, excellent healthcare facilities, and comprehensive shopping options. The region's consistent property appreciation and strong rental yields make it an increasingly attractive investment destination, while maintaining authentic Spanish charm and lower costs than more touristy coastal areas.
